name: It's FRYDay!
description:
Welcome to your new job at McUploads Fries and Nothing Else! Being an overworked, underpaid food service employee, you have a deep hatred of McUploads and wish to make them lose as much money as possible. You will do this by overfilling fry containers! Deep-fried potato-y power to the people!

But watch out! Your boss is on the prowl! He’ll slowly approach you while you work, and will scold you if he catches you red-handed. Keep an eye on him, and sneak past as many overfull fry packets as possible!
